trigger: Our results suggest that the target of PGE2 action is a component in the signal transduction pathway leading to the activation of protein kinase C . However , the inhibition of the T cell activation signals by PGE2 is selective .

Our results suggest that the target of PGE2 action is a component in the signal transduction pathway leading to the activation of protein kinase C . However , the inhibition of the T cell activation signals by PGE2 is selective .
PGE2 enhanced the complex formation with NF-AT , AP-1 and CLE0 sequences when the cells were activated by either anti-CD3 mAb or PMA / A23187 stimulation .
PGE2 enhanced the complex formation with NF-AT , AP-1 and CLE0 sequences when the cells were activated by either anti-CD3 mAb or PMA / A23187 stimulation .
It seems therefore that PGE2 , by elevating cAMP levels , interferes with the activation pathway for NF-kappa B but not for NF-AT , AP-1 or CLE0 binding protein .
It seems therefore that PGE2 , by elevating cAMP levels , interferes with the activation pathway for NF-kappa B but not for NF-AT , AP-1 or CLE0 binding protein .
